mapper.insert: insert into electricity_statistics( dltj_project_id, dltj_rq, dltj_yjfdl, dltj_sjfdl, dltj_pc, dltj_sjjsdl, dltj_sjdfsr, dltj_ljswdl, dltj_ljjsdl, dltj_ljfdl, dltj_dfjsljsjdz, dltj_ljwdzdf, dltj_dfsy, dltj_bt, dltj_qt, dltj_bysrhj, dltj_lx, dltj_xwdf, dltj_rggz, dltj_wjbljqt, dltj_byzchj, create_time )values( #{electricityCash.xmqkProjectId}, #{electricityCash.dltjRq}, #{electricityCash.dltjYjfdl}, #{electricityCash.dltjSjfdl}, #{electricityCash.dltjPc}, #{electricityCash.dltjSjjsdl}, #{electricityCash.dltjSjdfsr}, #{electricityCash.dltjLjswdl}, #{electricityCash.dltjLjjsdl}, #{electricityCash.dltjLjfdl}, #{electricityCash.dltjDfjsljsjdz}, #{electricityCash.dltjLjwdzdf}, #{electricityCash.dltjDfsy}, #{electricityCash.dltjBt}, #{electricityCash.dltjQt}, #{electricityCash.dltjBysrhj}, #{electricityCash.dltjLx}, #{electricityCash.dltjXwdf}, #{electricityCash.dltjRggz}, #{electricityCash.dltjWjbljqt}, #{electricityCash.dltjByzchj}, sysdate() )
